0 in
11 general
22 to
33 avoid
44 their
55 limitations
66 In
77 particular
88 it
99 works
230 well
253 even
276 when
299 the
322 load
345 factor
368 grows
391 beyond
414 09
893 The
940 algorithm
987 is
1034 well
1081 suited
1128 for
1175 implementing
1222 a
1269 resizable
1316 concurrent
1363 hash
1410 table
1457 The
1504 hopscotch
1551 hashing
1598 algorithm
1645 works
1692 by
3589 defining
3686 a
3783 neighborhood
3880 of
3977 buckets
4074 near
4171 the
4268 original
4365 hashed
4462 bucket
4559 where
4656 a
4753 given
4850 entry
4947 is
5044 always
5141 found
5238 Thus
5335 search
5432 is
5529 limited
5626 to
5723 the
5820 number
5917 of
6014 entries
6111 in
6208 this
6305 neighborhood
6402 which
6499 is
6596 logarithmic
6693 in
6790 the
6887 worst
6984 case
7081 constant
14578 on
14775 average
14972 and
15169 with
15366 proper
15563 alignment
15760 of
15957 the
16154 neighborhood
16351 typically
16548 requires
16745 one
16942 cache
17139 miss
17336 When
17533 inserting
17730 an
17927 entry
18124 one
18321 first
18518 attempts
18715 to
18912 add
19109 it
19306 to
19503 a
19700 bucket
19897 in
20094 the
20291 neighborhood
20488 However
20685 if
20882 all
21079 buckets
21276 in
21473 this
21670 neighborhood
21867 are
22064 occupied
22261 the
22458 algorithm
22655 traverses
22852 buckets
23049 in
23246 sequence
23443 until
23640 an
23837 open
24034 slot
24231 an
24428 unoccupied
24625 bucket
24822 is
25019 found
25216 as
25413 in
25610 linear
25807 probing
26004 At
26201 that
26398 point
26595 since
26792 the
26989 empty
27186 bucket
27383 is
27580 outside
27777 the
27974 neighborhood
28171 items
28368 are
28565 repeatedly
28762 displaced
28959 in
29156 a
59153 sequence
59550 of
59947 hops
60344 This
60741 is
61138 similar
61535 to
61932 cuckoo
62329 hashing
62726 but
63123 with
63520 the
63917 difference
64314 that
64711 in
65108 this
65505 case
65902 the
66299 empty
66696 slot
67093 is
67490 being
67887 moved
68284 into
68681 the
69078 neighborhood
69475 instead
69872 of
70269 items
70666 being
71063 moved
71460 out
71857 with
72254 the
72651 hope
73048 of
73445 eventually
73842 finding
74239 an
74636 empty
75033 slot
75430 Each
75827 hop
76224 brings
76621 the
77018 open
77415 slot
77812 closer
78209 to
78606 the
79003 original
79400 neighborhood
79797 without
80194 invalidating
80591 the
80988 neighborhood
81385 property
81782 of
82179 any
82576 of
82973 the
83370 buckets
83767 along
84164 the
84561 way
84958 In
85355 the
85752 end
86149 the
86546 open
86943 slot
87340 has
87737 been
88134 moved
88531 into
88928 the
89325 neighborhood
89722 and
90119 the
90516 entry

91310 inserted

92104 be
92501 added
92898 to
93295 it
93692 Robin
94089 Hood
94486 hashing
94883 One
95280 interesting
95677 variation
96074 on
96471 double
96868 hashing
97265 collision
97662 resolution
98059 is
98456 Robin
98853 Hood
99250 hashing1415
99647 The
100044 idea
100441 is
100838 that
101235 a
101632 new

102823 displace

103617 key
104014 already

106396 is

108381 the

109572 the
109969 current

113542 it
113939 reduces

1140258 determined
1141855 by

1145049 same
1146646 space
1148243 time
1149840 tradeoff
1151437 as
1153034 for
1154631 dynamic
1156228 arrays
1157825 Resizing
1159422 is
1161019 accompanied

1164213 a
1165810 full
1167407 or
1169004 incremental
1170601 table

1173795 whereby
1175392 existing
1176989 items

1180183 mapped

1188168 To
1189765 limit

1196153 memory

1202541 empty

1226496 when
1228093 items
1229690 are
1231287 deleted
1232884 From
1234481 the
1236078 point

1239272 space
1240869 time
1242466 tradeoffs
1244063 this
1245660 operation
1247257 is
1248854 similar
1250451 to
1252048 the
1253645 deallocation
1255242 in
1256839 dynamic

1260033 Resizing
1261630 by
1263227 copying
1264824 all
1266421 entries
1268018 A
1269615 common
1271212 approach
1272809 is
1274406 to
1276003 automatically
1277600 trigger
1279197 a
1280794 complete
1282391 resizing
1283988 when
1285585 the
1287182 load
1288779 factor
1290376 exceeds
1291973 some
1293570 threshold
1295167 rmax
1296764 Then
1298361 a
1299958 new
1301555 larger
1303152 table
1304749 is
1306346 allocated

1309540 the

1323913 inserted
1325510 into

1328704 new

1333495 the
1335092 old
1336689 table

1339883 returned
1341480 to
1343077 the
1344674 free
1346271 storage
1347868 pool
1349465 Symmetrically
1351062 when
1352659 the
1354256 load
1355853 factor
1357450 falls
1359047 below
1360644 a
1362241 second
1363838 threshold

1368629 entries
1370226 are
1371823 moved
1373420 to
1375017 a
1376614 new
1378211 smaller
1379808 table
1381405 If

1384599 table

1394181 a
1395778 fixed
1397375 percentage

1566657 Some
1568254 hash
1569851 table
1571448 implementations
1573045 notably
1574642 in
1576239 real
1577836 time
1579433 systems
1581030 cannot
1582627 pay
1584224 the
1585821 price
1587418 of
1589015 enlarging

1592209 hash
1593806 table
1595403 all
1597000 at
1598597 once
1600194 because
1601791 it
1603388 may
1604985 interrupt
1606582 time
1608179 critical
1609776 operations
1611373 If
1612970 one
1614567 cannot
1616164 avoid
1617761 dynamic
1619358 resizing
1620955 a
1622552 solution
1624149 is
1625746 to
1627343 perform
1628940 the
1630537 resizing
1632134 gradually
1633731 During
1635328 the
1636925 resize
1638522 allocate
1640119 the
1641716 new
1643313 hash
1644910 table
1646507 but
1648104 keep
1649701 the
1651298 old
1652895 table
1654492 unchanged
1656089 In
1657686 each
1659283 lookup
1660880 or

1664074 operation
1665671 check
1667268 both
1668865 tables
1670462 Perform
1672059 insertion
1673656 operations
1675253 only
1676850 in
1678447 the
1680044 new
1681641 table

1684835 each
1686432 insertion
1688029 also
1689626 move
1691223 r
1692820 elements
1694417 from
1696014 the
1697611 old

1702402 the

1705596 table

1708790 all

1711984 are

1723163 it

1726357 ensure

1785446 during

1788640 Monotonic
1790237 keys
1791834 If
1793431 it
1795028 is
1796625 known
1798222 that
1799819 key
1801416 values
1803013 will
1804610 always
1806207 increase
1807804 or
1809401 decrease

1812595 then

1823774 be

1833356 of
1834953 the
1836550 single
1838147 most
1839744 recent

1842938 value
1844535 at

1847729 hash

1850923 resize

1855714 lookup
1857311 keys
1858908 that
1860505 fall
1862102 in
1863699 the

1866893 defined
1868490 by
1870087 these

1873281 entries

1876475 directed

1879669 the
1881266 appropriate
1882863 hash
1884460 function
1886057 and
1887654 indeed
1889251 hash
1890848 table
1892445 both
1894042 of
1895639 which
1897236 can
1898833 be
1900430 different
1902027 for
1903624 each
1905221 range
1906818 Since
1908415 it
1910012 is
1911609 common
1913206 to
3840397 grow
3843600 the
3846803 overall
3850006 number
3853209 of
3856412 entries

3872427 only
3875630 be
3878833 OlgN
3882036 ranges
3885239 to
3888442 check
3891645 and
3894848 binary
3898051 search
3901254 time
3904457 for
3907660 the
3910863 redirection
3914066 would
3917269 be
3920472 OlglgN
3923675 As
3926878 with
3930081 consistent
3933284 hashing
3936487 this
3939690 approach
3942893 guarantees
3946096 that
3949299 any
3952502 keys
3955705 hash
3958908 once
3962111 issued
3965314 will
3968517 never
3971720 change
3974923 even
3978126 when
3981329 the
3984532 hash
3987735 table
3990938 is
3994141 later
3997344 grown
4000547 Other
4003750 solutions
4006953 Linear
4010156 hashing20
4013359 is
4016562 a
4019765 hash
4022968 table
4026171 algorithm
4029374 that
4032577 permits
4035780 incremental
4038983 hash
4042186 table
4045389 expansion
4048592 It
4051795 is
4054998 implemented
4058201 using
4061404 a
4064607 single
4067810 hash
4071013 table
4074216 but
4077419 with
4080622 two
4083825 possible
4087028 look
4090231 up
4093434 functions
4096637 Another
4099840 way
4103043 to
4106246 decrease
4109449 the
4112652 cost
4115855 of
4119058 table
4122261 resizing
4125464 is
4128667 to
4131870 choose
4135073 a
4138276 hash
4141479 function
4144682 in
4147885 such
4151088 a
4154291 way
4157494 that
4160697 the
4163900 hashes
4167103 of
4170306 most
4173509 values
4176712 do
4179915 not
4183118 change
4186321 when
4189524 the
4192727 table
4195930 is
4199133 resized
4202336 This
4205539 approach
4208742 called
4211945 consistent
4215148 hashing
4218351 is
4221554 prevalent
4224757 in
4227960 disk
4231163 based
4234366 and
4237569 distributed
4240772 hashes
4243975 where
4247178 rehashing
4250381 is
4253584 prohibitively
4256787 costly
4259990 Performance
4263193 analysis
4266396 In
4269599 the
4272802 simplest
4276005 model
4279208 the
4282411 hash
4285614 function
4288817 is
4292020 completely
4295223 unspecified
4298426 and
4301629 the
4304832 table
4308035 does
4311238 not
4314441 resize
4317644 For
4320847 the
4324050 best
4327253 possible
4330456 choice
4333659 of
4336862 hash
4340065 function
4343268 a
4346471 table
4349674 of
4352877 size
4356080 k
4359283 with
4362486 open
4365689 addressing
4368892 has
4372095 no
4375298 collisions
4378501 and
4381704 holds
4384907 up
4388110 to
4391313 k
4394516 elements
4397719 with
4400922 a
4404125 single
4407328 comparison
4410531 for
4413734 successful
4416937 lookup
4420140 and
4423343 a
4426546 table
4429749 of
4432952 size
4436155 k
4439358 with
4442561 chaining
4445764 and
4448967 n
4452170 keys
4455373 has
4458576 the
4461779 minimum
4464982 max0
4468185 n
4471388 k
4474591 collisions
4477794 and
4480997 O1
4484200 n
4487403 k
4490606 comparisons
4493809 for
4497012 lookup
4500215 For
4503418 the
4506621 worst
4509824 choice
4513027 of
4516230 hash
4519433 function
4522636 every
4525839 insertion
4529042 causes
4532245 a
4535448 collision
4538651 and
4541854 hash
4545057 tables

6024843 that

6031249 are
6034452 no
6037655 collisions
6040858 in

6053670 entries

6066482 hash

6104918 only

6114527 pseudo

6127339 there

6136948 efficient

6175384 given

6213820 a
6217023 separate
6220226 sorting

6236241 proportional
6239444 to
6242647 logn
6245850 per
6249053 entry

6268271 have

6290692 logn

6313113 at
